title: 129 - Al Go Rhythm with special guest John Branyan
description:
The gang is joined by comedian and good ol’ Tim pal, John Branyan! A masterclass ensues on the art of stand up and everyone tries out material, new and old, that you won’t want to miss. Resolved in this episode: God decides who’s funny and who’s not and the government can get over your fence if they so desire...probably. Luke speaks blasphemy of cotton candy and Livy counts down from ten. 
 Big thanks to our sponsors!
 Mack Weldon: For 20% off your first order, visit Mack Weldon.com/HAWKINS and enter promo code HAWKINS
 Skylight Frames: For $10 off your purchase of a Skylight Frame, go to skylightframe.com and enter code TIM
 Public Goods: Go to publicgoods.com/HAWKINS or use code HAWKINS to receive $15 off your first order
